DiscoverOpportunities: Discover opportunities you never knew existed thoughtfully designed to strengthen your brand and be the envy of your competition. Let's redefine your success.
TeamAssistance: Our team is ready to assist you with every detail. Drop us an email.
Name: Name
TellUsMore: Tell us more about your inquiry and requirements
ExperienceDescription: Whether you're seeking a tranquil retreat or an active adventure, our team offers an unmatched experience that will create memories to last a lifetime across Sri Lanka and the Maldives.
airportShuttleAnswer: Yes, we provide complimentary shuttle service to ensure a seamless experience from the airport to your destination.
retreatDistanceQuestion: How far is the retreat from the airport?
retreatDistanceAnswer: Our retreat is located approximately 45 minutes from the main airport, offering convenient access while maintaining tranquility.
fitnessQuestion: Are there fitness facilities at the resort?
fitnessAnswer: Yes, we have a fully equipped fitness center, yoga pavilion, and various water sports activities available.
bookingQuestion: How can I book my experience?
bookingAnswer: You can book through our website, contact us directly, or speak with our travel consultants for personalized assistance.
parkingAnswer: Yes, complimentary parking is available for all guests throughout their stay.
checkinQuestion: What is the check-in and check-out time at Maldives?
checkinAnswer: Check-in is at 3:00 PM and check-out is at 12:00 PM. Early check-in and late check-out may be available upon request.
yachtQuestion: Can I arrive by yacht or private boat?
yachtAnswer: Yes, we have marina facilities and can accommodate private yacht arrivals with advance notice.
spaQuestion: Are spa and wellness treatments available on-site?
spaAnswer: Our world-class spa offers a full range of wellness treatments, massages, and holistic therapies.
diningQuestion: Can I book a private dining experience or celebration?
diningAnswer: Absolutely! We offer bespoke dining experiences and can arrange special celebrations with our dedicated events team.
honeymoonQuestion: Is the resort suitable for honeymooners or special occasions?
honeymoonAnswer: Yes, we specialize in romantic getaways and special celebrations with tailored packages and experiences.
